# `Format` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| flags | `string[]` | No | The Set of prompt segment format flags i.e. each entry is a part of describing the overall format. E.g. "format": { "flags": [StringPlayChars] } |
